event.description: Alex Presley singles on a fly ball to left fielder Nolan Reimold.
Josh Harrison doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Nolan Reimold. Alex Presley scores.
Yamaico Navarro grounds out, second baseman Robert Andino to first baseman Chris Davis. Josh Harrison to 3rd.
Matt Hague singles on a ground ball to left fielder Nolan Reimold. Josh Harrison scores.
Pedro Alvarez called out on strikes.
Gorkys Hernandez called out on strikes.
Garrett Jones singles on a line drive to right fielder Jai Miller.
Starling Marte singles on a bunt ground ball to third baseman Mark Reynolds. Garrett Jones to 2nd.
Michael McKenry grounds into double play, third baseman Mark Reynolds to second baseman Robert Andino to first baseman Chris Davis. Garrett Jones to 3rd. Starling Marte out at 2nd.
Alex Presley singles on a ground ball to second baseman Robert Andino. Garrett Jones scores.
Josh Harrison called out on strikes.
Pitcher Change: Kevin Gregg replaces Brian Matusz.
Yamaico Navarro singles on a line drive to center fielder Adam Jones.
Matt Hague homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Yamaico Navarro scores.
Pedro Alvarez strikes out swinging.
Gorkys Hernandez called out on strikes.
Garrett Jones strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Matt Lindstrom replaces Kevin Gregg.
Starling Marte singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Nolan Reimold, deflected by shortstop J. Hardy.
With Michael McKenry batting, Starling Marte steals (1) 2nd base.
Michael McKenry grounds out, shortstop J. Hardy to first baseman Chris Davis.
Alex Presley triples (1) on a line drive to center fielder Adam Jones. Starling Marte scores.
Josh Harrison walks.
Yamaico Navarro singles on a ground ball to shortstop J. Hardy. Alex Presley scores. Josh Harrison to 2nd.

Matt Hague grounds into a force out, shortstop J. Hardy to second baseman Robert Andino. Josh Harrison scores. Yamaico Navarro out at 2nd. Matt Hague advances to 1st, on throwing error by second baseman Robert Andino.
Pedro Alvarez grounds into a force out, second baseman Robert Andino to shortstop J. Hardy. Matt Hague out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Darren O'Day replaces Matt Lindstrom.
Gorkys Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Garrett Jones walks.
Starling Marte singles on a ground ball to left fielder Nolan Reimold. Garrett Jones to 2nd.
Michael McKenry flies out to center fielder Adam Jones.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Robbie Grossman replaces Alex Presley.
Robbie Grossman singles on a soft ground ball to shortstop J. Hardy. Garrett Jones scores. Starling Marte scores. Robbie Grossman to 2nd. Throwing error by first baseman Chris Davis.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Chase d'Arnaud replaces Josh Harrison.
Chase d'Arnaud strikes out swinging.
Manny Machado remains in the game as the shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Steve Tolleson replaces catcher Matt Wieters, batting 5th, playing second base.
Pitcher Change: Oscar Villarreal replaces Darren O'Day.
Defensive Substitution: John Hester replaces second baseman Robert Andino, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: L. J. Hoes replaces left fielder Nolan Reimold, batting 1st, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Glynn Davis replaces center fielder Adam Jones, batting 3rd, playing center field.
Anderson Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Matt Hague singles on a ground ball to center fielder Glynn Davis.
Jordy Mercer strikes out swinging.
With Evan Chambers batting, passed ball by John Hester, Matt Hague to 2nd.
Evan Chambers pops out to shortstop Manny Machado.
Buck Britton remains in the game as the third baseman.
Pitcher Change: Troy Patton replaces Oscar Villarreal.
Edgardo Baez remains in the game as the right fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Jeff Larish replaces right fielder Jai Miller, batting 8th, playing first base.
Jeff Clement grounds out, shortstop Manny Machado to first baseman Jeff Larish.
Quincy Latimore triples (1) on a line drive to center fielder Glynn Davis.
Tony Sanchez walks.
Robbie Grossman grounds into double play, shortstop Manny Machado to second baseman Steve Tolleson to first baseman Jeff Larish. Tony Sanchez out at 2nd.
Chase d'Arnaud grounds out, pitcher Troy Patton to first baseman Jeff Larish.
Anderson Hernandez grounds out, third baseman Buck Britton to first baseman Jeff Larish.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Eric Fryer replaces Matt Hague.
Eric Fryer singles on a ground ball to center fielder Glynn Davis.
Jordy Mercer strikes out swinging.
Trent Mummey remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Stuart Pomeranz replaces Troy Patton.
Evan Chambers grounds out, third baseman Buck Britton to first baseman Jeff Larish.
Jeff Clement pops out to shortstop Manny Machado.
Quincy Latimore singles on a ground ball to left fielder L. J. Hoes.
Tony Sanchez singles on a line drive to right fielder Edgardo Baez. Quincy Latimore to 2nd.
Robbie Grossman grounds into a force out, shortstop Manny Machado to second baseman Steve Tolleson. Tony Sanchez out at 2nd.
Nolan Reimold grounds out sharply, pitcher Jo-Jo Reyes to first baseman Garrett Jones.
J. Hardy strikes out swinging.
Adam Jones singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Alex Presley, deflected by shortstop Josh Harrison.
Mark Reynolds reaches on fielding error by right fielder Starling Marte. Adam Jones scores. Mark Reynolds to 2nd.
Matt Wieters grounds out, third baseman Pedro Alvarez to first baseman Garrett Jones.
Ryan Adams singles on a ground ball to center fielder Gorkys Hernandez.
Chris Davis singles on a line drive to right fielder Starling Marte. Ryan Adams to 2nd.
Jai Miller strikes out swinging.
Robert Andino flies out to right fielder Starling Marte.

Nolan Reimold strikes out swinging.

J. Hardy walks.

Nolan Reimold strikes out swinging.

Steve Tolleson reaches on fielding error by left fielder Robbie Grossman. Buck Britton to 3rd. Steve Tolleson to 2nd.

Chris Davis singles on a ground ball to right fielder Quincy Latimore. Steve Tolleson scores.
